display_help: Logging out in the Mission Architect area will earn you bonus tickets after completing Mission Architect content for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Architect Day Job badge, that will double the ticket bonus upon mission completion, by logging out here.
display_target_help: Logging out in the Mission Architect area will earn you bonus tickets after completing Mission Architect content for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours.
